top_categories.workout_context: 90ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Cohutta Gravel Grinder's North Georgia mountains, Cohutta Wilderness forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Cohutta Gravel Grinder's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
At Cohutta Gravel Grinder, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Cohutta Gravel Grinder. Train it until it feels boring.
9,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
9,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Cohutta Gravel Grinder, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 9,000ft of climbing on Georgia Cohutta mountain gravel does to your power file on race day.
Low-cadence force work for 9,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Cohutta Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on georgia cohutta mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: north georgia mountains, cohutta wilderness, 100-mile distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 100 miles of georgia cohutta mountain gravel in Chatsworth, Georgia.
